name: BanchoStingmon
description: BanchoStingmon is an insectoid with a humanoid body structure and green eyes. Its body is covered in a red exoskeleton and has long purple hair at the back of the head. It has talons on its feet, two drill-based "Spikes" under each of its wrists in golden gauntlets with longer ones over it's fists, and has red claw-like fingers on its hands. It also has pair of two insect-like wings on its back and two long red and dark red-striped antennae on its head. It wears a dark purple symbolic Gakuran with short cupped sleeves and black baggy pants.
